name: Number/Timeline list
description: Displays a list of items in a specific sequence, indicated by a number or time. This is perfect for showing information where order is critical, such as daily schedules (timelines), step-by-step instructions, recipes, or process flows.
examples: What is my schedule for today?
Create an itinerary for my trip.

component_title.description: A brief title for the entire list (e.g., 'Today's Schedule', 'Spaghetti Recipe').

timeline_list.description: An array of items to be displayed in a numbered or chronological sequence. Recommended 1-5 items.

list_subject.description: A short subject or heading for the list item. (Note: Text may be truncated with '...' if it exceeds display limits).

list_content.description: The detailed description or content for the list item.

html:
{{ data.component_title }}

{{ item.list_subject }}

{{ item.list_content }}
